tidbits.title: Lakes and Forests
tidbits.description: Belarus is blessed with abundant forests and over 11,000 lakes, including the Braslaw Lakes, offering picturesque landscapes and opportunities for outdoor activities.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Belarus boasts a rich cultural heritage, seen in its diverse architecture, traditional crafts like pottery and embroidery, and the UNESCO-listed Mir Castle Complex.

tidbits.title: Bison Reserve
tidbits.description: Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park hosts Europe's largest population of European bison, symbolizing conservation efforts and biodiversity in the region.
